channel.title: Skiyo - The Future of Search
channel.description:
Hello Moparians, I want to bring up here a project that is being worked on by a wonderful team. The project consists PHP, CSS, C#, SQL (Lots of Database entries by hand) and some more development ways that will be implanted to different apps that the actual project will consist. Ok, so to bring you up to date regarding what the project is and what we have so far and what we will have in the future I will make it all organized over here. The current project name is: [size=7]Skiyo[/size] [hr]
This project is about building a new type of search engine, this will be nothing like google, yahoo, msn, bing and all the other search engines that exist.
[hr]
Some of the exclusive features that are being worked on right now:
[ul][li] General Search[/li] [li] Smart AI Bot[/li] [li] Calender[/li] [li] Stocks[/li] [li] Mail[/li] [li] Job Search[/li] [li] Image Upload[/li] [li] URL Shortner[/li] [li] Calorie Counter[/li] [li] News[/li] [li] Recipes[/li] [li] E-Books[/li] [li] Translator[/li] [li] Real-Estate[/li] [li] App Store[/li][/ul]
[ul][li] UI 70%[/li] [li] Smart AI 15%[/li] [li] Search Engine 10%[/li] [li] app's 20%[/li][/ul]
[hr] [size=5]Screen shots are being uploaded of current progress [/size] This is what I can show you for now. More to come.
For questions regarding this project, or if you would like to contribute feel free to contact me: Mail: [email]Shony@Skiyo.Org[/email] Skype: Shony.Arnon [hr]
Skiyo Crew:
Joshua Coombs - Founder & CEO
Shony Kellman - Head of Social & Buisness Affairs
Jessica Badpenis - Head of Information and Data
Nic LaQuatra - Co-Founder/CSS
Nathan Tarbuck - Graphic Designer

item.title: Skiyo - The Future of Search
item.dc:creator: @twins twins
item.description:
@twins wrote:

Well since I am still working on the development post (got a lot to add), I will tell you the actual thing that makes us specials.

Our special search engine is an engine that will work as follows.

you search: play umbrella Result: will play the song umbrella
you search: image husky Result: You will receive only photos of Husky without any BS or nonrelated stuff.
you search: remind me tomorrow at 5 pm to buy milk Result: tomorrow at 5PM you will be reminded at some sort of way (Message, App Alert, Email) that you need to buy milk

now this is the simple stuff, later on I will get into the more complicated stuff.

Basically the search engine is going to be built by hand, without crawlers. Now you probably are asking me and a crew of 4 people can write billions of terms and insert results for it…

The solution for this will be all the 2-4 Billion people that are using the internet, it will basically become a big group activity.

If you will search something and you will not be satisfied you will be able to make your own result or tell us that the result is not what you looked for. Now while this happens we will get a lot of traffic of people saying they did not get results… we have a developed a special bot that figures that out and tries to pull a smarter and more common result, this will happen in a loop until the percentage of happy searchers will be above a certain number.

You get the picture?

Read full topic

item.title: Skiyo - The Future of Search
item.dc:creator: @justaguy justaguy
item.description:
@justaguy wrote:

Alot of this stuff has already been done by the search engines you claim are nothing like yours. For example, Google already has: general search, calendar, stocks, (g)mail, jobs, news, ebooks, (google) translator, even real estate. The other things you mention really don’t pertain to a search engine so I don’t know why those would be features. As for the smart AI bot, I don’t have an opinion on that one since I don’t know much about it.

The point is: this stuff has already been done by Google, and this is just one company I’m using as an example. Got anything else?

Read full topic
